articles.title: Relief as Argentina reach Copa America final to give Messi another shot at glory - ESPN India
articles.description: Lionel Messi, 34, remains in the hunt for his first senior title with Argentina after a tense penalty shootout win over Colombia on Tuesday.
articles.content:
The tension was almost too much for Argentina's veteran players to take -- they have traumatic memories of penalty shootouts in the Copa America finals of 2015 and 2016.

articles.description: BRASILIA:     Emiliano Martinez needed only a month to establish himself as Argentina's number one goalkeeper and on Tuesday he became a new national hero by saving three times in a shootout in their Copa America semi-final against Colombia.

articles.title: How to watch England vs Denmark in Euro 2020 Semifinals from India? - Goal.com
articles.description: The 10 South American countries are down to the two heavyweights at the 2021 Copa America: It will be Brazil vs. Argentina in the final that every neutral wanted to see on Saturday, July 10 at the Maracana.

articles.title: The US war in Afghanistan is over. This is how it began and what it left behind - ABC News
articles.description: For the first time in 20 years, Afghanistan is all but free of foreign troops. But with the Taliban's rapid advance as American and NATO  troops leave, its future looks uncertain.
articles.content:
With American and NATO troops having all but departed Afghanistan after 20 years of war, the country is still riven by internal conflict. 
The United States descended on Afghanistan and its Taliban … [+9416 chars]

articles.title: Biden admin launching 'door-to-door' push to vaccinate Americans, sparks major backlash - Fox News
articles.description: The Biden administration is launching a new "door-to-door" effort to vaccinate Americans after falling short of its Fourth of July goal of having 70 percent of the adult population with at least one shot of the coronavirus vaccine.
